oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harlan Howard Studio Recordings
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of a variety of Harlan Howard (musician) track recordings. The tape continues to record a variety of room sounds. The recordings are from an unidentified date.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harlan Howard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) The Tide Has Turned (Harlan Howard) -- (01:42) Woman Low Down (Harlan Howard) -- (03:22) Hey There Mule (Harlan Howard) -- (05:33) Waste of Time (Harlan Howard) -- (07:07) We're Through (Harlan Howard) -- (08:57) Marryin' Kind (Harlan Howard) -- (10:29) Poor Little Juan (Harlan Howard) -- (12:16) Suburbs of Your Heart (Harlan Howard) -- (13:16) Catch Me if You Can (Harlan Howard) -- (15:28) Hey There Mule (Harlan Howard) -- (17:47) The Tide Has Turned (Harlan Howard) -- (19:30) Various room sounds including: clock ticking, television, and baby crying -- (22:42) unidentified guitar playing -- (23:59) Various room sounds including a toilet flush
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Howard, Harlan;
